column4: yesterday i was complaining that my 10.04 installation had slow internet and the solution i found was rather unusual, can someone help me figure this out. The problem was that whenever i launched any browser it would take for ever to load any website, sites were timing out before making connection, and speedtest.net (When i finally got it to load) reported .5mbps to 1.5mbps down, and like 3mbps up, however on this same machine in an
so what i found out was that if i click the mouse on the dialog border where the title of the browser is, and shake it vigorously, then the sites wouldnt time out
i'm not making this up, i have to actually shake the screen of all the apps to get them to respond to commands
